channel.title: Postman on Become a Full-Stack Tester Here
channel.description: Recent content in Postman on Become a Full-Stack Tester Here

item.title: Trade Me-1-API testing first demo | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
What’re the reasons for writing the series?

  • 1st, for testing skills demonstration.

The author wanted to demonstrate his comprehensive skills within API, UI, mobile automation testing domains through a series of automation testing practices sharing.

  • 2nd, for guiding those who are new to automation testing.

Choose a popular product to demonstrate its API automation testing process will be an easy way for the above people to quickly get started into the automation testing domain to save their time.

  • 3rd, for mutual boost and progress.

item.title: Trade Me-2-typical transactions | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
How to pick the typical transactions?

Before coding the API test script, we need to pick some typical transactions from TradeMe.

And these transactions we’ve picked better to cover different types of requests, such as the get, post, delete.

And part of these transactions should correlate with each other at the business level.

item.title: Trade Me-3-Retrieve general categories API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Retrieves all or part of the Trade Me category tree.

item.title: Trade Me-4-Retrieve your watchlist API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Retrieves a list of items on the authenticated user’s watchlist.

item.title: Trade Me-5-Remove a listing from your watchlist API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Removes a listing from the authenticated user’s watchlist.

item.title: Trade Me-6-Retrieve closing soon listings API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Retrieves the items closing soon for the whole country or for a single region.

item.title: Trade Me-7-Add a listing to your watchlist API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Adds a listing to the authenticated user’s watchlist.

item.title: Trade Me-8-Retrieve your won items API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Retrieves a list of purchases for the authenticated user.

Multiple-quantity auctions can be purchased multiple times.

item.title: Trade Me-9-Remove a purchase from your won items list API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Hides a listing from the won items list.

item.title: Trade Me-10-General search API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Allows you to search for listings on Trade Me by category, by keywords or a combination of these two.

item.title: Trade Me-11-Retrieve the details of a single listing API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Retrieves the details of a single listing.

item.title: Trade Me-12-Buy an auction using Buy Now API testing | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API Function

Buys an item using Buy Now.

item.title: Trade Me-13-scenarios-and-newman-reports | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
Scenario‘s position in the API automation testing

Typical transactions selection -> Corresponding API selection -> Scripting -> Scenarios and reports(I’m here) -> CICD

item.title: Trade Me-14-Jenkins-CI-process | Postman API automation testing
item.description:
API automation testing CI process

Typical transactions selection -> Corresponding API selection -> Scripting -> Scenarios and reports -> CI(I’m here)

item.title: How to install Postman?

The steps of Postman installation
